title: Search with calendar and see pages stats on Analytics.

content.value: Search with calendar and see pages stats on Analytics.

content.content:
Hi there,

We’re excited to introduce our new Calendar-Based Page Stats feature! This update makes it easier than ever to see how your website is performing on specific dates.

**Easy Date Filtering**: Use the calendar to select specific dates or date ranges.



**Detailed Metrics**: See views, visitors, bounce rates, and more for individual pages.



**Better Visuals**: Enjoy clear charts and graphs that make data easy to understand.

description: We've added a new tool to make your analytics even better! Now you can view page stats and search by calendar dates. Check it out and see how it can help you!
